title: Love Bites
description: Elisabeth Bathory wears a police uniform and patrols the streets of London at night.Elisabeth Bathory is over four hundred and sixty years old.Elisabeth Bathory is a vampire.Elisabeth Bathory enforces the Edict ensuring humans are never killed by vampires.Humans are starting to turn up dead and itâ€™s obvious her people are behind it!A saucy vampire adventure in a modern-day setting with romance and humour and lots of blood.
author: Kyt Wright
